title: Powerball ticket worth $790,000 sold in Los Angeles as jackpot climbs to $1.2 billion
dc:creator: Noah Goldberg
description: Powerball jackpot climbs to $1.2 billion; L.A. lottery player won $790,000 Monday for matching five of the six numbers
content:encoded: Powerball jackpot climbs to $1.2 billion; L.A. lottery player won $790,000 Monday for matching five of the six numbers

media:content.media:description: People line up to purchase lottery tickets for the drawing of the Powerball lottery at the Blue Bird Liquor store in Hawthorne, Calif., Monday, Oct. 31, 2022. (AP Photo/Damian Dovarganes)
